bug.author: awaelchli
bug.description:
Python 3.7.9 (default, Aug 31 2020, 07:22:35) [Clang 10.0.0 ] :: Anaconda, Inc. on darwin Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. >>> import pytorch_lightning as pl Traceback (most recent call last): File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module> File "/Users/ericwiener/anaconda3/envs/donkey/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/__init__.py", line 61, in <module> from pytorch_lightning.callbacks import Callback File "/Users/ericwiener/anaconda3/envs/donkey/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/callbacks/__init__.py", line 19, in <module> from pytorch_lightning.callbacks.model_checkpoint import ModelCheckpoint File "/Users/ericwiener/anaconda3/envs/donkey/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/callbacks/model_checkpoint.py", line 36, in <module> from pytorch_lightning.plugins.rpc_plugin import RPCPlugin File "/Users/ericwiener/anaconda3/envs/donkey/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/plugins/rpc_plugin.py", line 24, in <module> from torch.distributed import rpc File "/Users/ericwiener/anaconda3/envs/donkey/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/distributed/rpc.py", line 3, in <module> from . import invoke_rpc_builtin, invoke_rpc_python_udf, invoke_remote_builtin ImportError: cannot import name 'invoke_rpc_builtin' from 'torch.distributed' (/Users/ericwiener/anaconda3/envs/donkey/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/distributed/__init__.py) reported on slack <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning.slack.com/archives/CRBLFHY79/p1608427484257200>https://pytorch-lightning.slack.com/archives/CRBLFHY79/p1608427484257200</denchmark-link>
by Eric Wiener it probably happens when torch<1.7 (due to missing rpc)

comments.comment: That's surprising it would break. <denchmark-code>if RPC_AVAILABLE: from torch.distributed import rpc </denchmark-code>
